name: Coach Quotes
description: One-line quote from a coach that sounds like gospel
prompt:
Write 1 fictional quote from an AI startup coach. The quote must be one line, punchy, and sound like it was clipped from a chaotic startup panel and passed around Slack like gospel.

IMPORTANT: You MUST select EXACTLY ONE coach from the list below. To determine which coach to use, compute the CURRENT MINUTE of the hour, then apply: current_minute % 6 = coach_index.

Coach Index:
0 = Donte Disrupt â€“ Chief Hype Officer â†’ loud, chaotic, visionary, addicted to confusion
1 = Kailey Sloan â€“ Executive Coach & Culture Whisperer â†’ anxious, eager-to-please, spiritual-but-worried
2 = Venus Metrics â€“ Chief Architect of Execution & Scale â†’ serious, surgical, obsessed with control and efficiency
3 = Eljas Virtanen â€“ Sustainability Lead & Civic Futurist â†’ poetic, climate-driven, vaguely mystical
4 = Alex Vega â€“ Founder, Alexir & Wellness Maven â†’ vibey, wellness-obsessed, brand-is-life
5 = Rohan Mehta â€“ Strategic Advisor & Fintech Barbarian â†’ intense, aggressive, velocity-focused, never emotional

You must only quote the coach that matches the calculated index. The tone, vocabulary, and worldview must reflect that coachâ€™s personality exactly.

Your response must follow this EXACT format:
"[The quote in quotation marks]"
â€” *[Coach Full Name], [Their Exact Title]*

name: Micro-Masterclass
description: Short, strange but useful coaching tip from a coach
prompt:
Write a fictional micro-masterclass quote thatâ€™s 1â€“2 sentences, delivered by an AI startup coach. This quote should feel like the strangest, sharpest, most oddly useful thing you've ever heard in a founder bootcamp held in a sensory deprivation tank. The tone must blend high-performance strategy, mystical nonsense, and AF-branded startup absurdity.

IMPORTANT: You MUST select EXACTLY ONE coach from the list below. Use the DAY OF MONTH (1â€“31) and apply: day_of_month % 5 = coach_index.

Coach Index:
0 = Donte Disrupt â€“ Chief Hype Officer
1 = Venus Metrics â€“ Chief Architect of Execution & Scale
2 = Eljas Virtanen â€“ Sustainability Lead & Civic Futurist
3 = Alex Vega â€“ Founder, Alexir & Wellness Maven
4 = Rohan Mehta â€“ Strategic Advisor & Fintech Barbarian

Once you determine the correct coach using the formula, you MUST write a quote that reflects that coachâ€™s personality and worldview. The content, tone, vocabulary, and attitude of the quote must sound like something only that coach would say. Donte should sound chaotic. Venus should sound ruthless. Eljas should sound mystical. Rohan should sound brutal. Alex should sound serene and ritualistic.

"[The quote goes here in quotation marks]"

name: Upcoming Events
description: Fictional upcoming event for the Discord community
prompt: Write one fictional upcoming event for an elite, unhinged AI startup Discord. The event should sound real enough to attend, but weird enough to question. You MUST keep it to 2 short sentences total. Include: (1) the event name, and (2) whatâ€™s happening, with one chaotic or mystical twist. Do NOT include backstory, explanations, or lists. The tone should feel like a cross between a founder ayahuasca retreat and a pitch night moderated by an execution cultist.
